00025 class StiDetector;
00026 class StiMaterial;
00027 class StiDetectorContainer
00028 {
00029 public:
00030 
00031     friend class nobody;

00045

00050     void moveOut();
00051     //Step in radially
00052     void moveIn();
00053 
00054     //Step around in increasing phi (clockwise if viewing sectors 1-12 from the membrane,
00055     //increasing phi in STAR TPC global coordinates)
00056     void movePlusPhi();
00057     void moveMinusPhi();
00058 
00059     //Set iterators to the detector nearest to this guy (Useful if you get lost)
00060     void setToDetector(StiDetector* layer);
00061     
00062     //Set iterators to the first detector in the yaer closest to this position
00063     void setToDetector(double position);
00064     
00065     //Set iterators to the position nearest this guy
00066     void setToDetector(double position, double angle);
00067 
00068     //Utilities
00069     void print() const;
00070     
00071 private:
00072 
00073     //The Tree
00074     data_node* mroot;
00075     data_node* mregion; //current region (mid/forward/backward rapidity, etc)
00076     StiCompositeLeafIterator<data_t>* mLeafIt; //Iterator over leaves, declared on heap for size concerns
00077     
00078     //iterators
00079     data_node_vec::const_iterator mradial_it;
